paper.title: A method of risk analysis about BOT project
paper.abstract: Traditional financial valuation method about BOT project is discussed and the shortcoming of this method is pointed out when it is used to analysis project's risk. Based on it, rational risk-adjusted discount rate is calculated by CAPM model; a project risk management technology is introduced to the investment's risk analysis; risk and return about investment of BOT highway project is valued synthetically by discounted cash flow model which combines decision tree model and scenario analysis. So a brief and applied risk-return analysis method is presented.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要讨论了BOT项目的风险分析方法，包括使用CAPM模型计算风险调整后的折现率，并结合决策树模型和情景分析进行综合风险评估。这些技术和方法主要用于金融风险管理领域，特别是项目投资的风险评估和管理。
